mapper.insert: insert into declaration( DECLARATION_NO, DECLARATION_TITLE, DECLARATION_WRITER, DECLARATION_RECEIVER, DECLARATION_REASON, DECLARATION_CONTENT, DECLARATION_DIVISION, board_name, board_no ) values( seq_declaration_no.nextval, #{declarationTitle}, #{declarationWriter}, #{declarationReceiver}, #{declarationReason}, #{declarationContent}, #{declarationDivision}, #{boardName}, #{boardNo} )
mapper.select: select * from declaration where declaration_deltype = 'N' order by declaration_no desc
mapper.update: update member set declaration_count = declaration_count+1 where member_Id = #{memberId}
update declaration set declaration_state = 'Y' where declaration_no = #{decNo}
